# The `pointee_iterator` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

An iterator type that allows iterating over the pointees via some other iterator.

The typical usage of this is to expose a type that iterates over Ts, but which is implemented with some iterator over T&#42;s:


<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a7f5af8c1ba2e11773efdbf7b6bc0d4e8">iterator</a> = <a href="#adf01b96db9ddeda9a3edfc4bd6b392b8">pointee&#95;iterator&lt;SmallVectorImpl&lt;T &#42;&gt;::iterator</a>&gt;;</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>

Definition at line 320 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/iterator-h">iterator.h</a>.
